data.message: Hi Wayne, thanks for your getting in touch. We’re really sorry to read of your loss and can certainly appreciate you wanting to order another personalised bottle in order to complete your family’s set. Unfortunately the Share a Coke promotion has ended in GB, so we aren't don't have the mechanic to make the personalised bottles at the moment, but please check out our online store for more personalised items :) http://spr.ly/61838KVNv
